betterquesting:10.desc:8:
the §6Energized Smelter§r is §5Mekanism§r's way to §esmelt or cook items using the power of RF§r (§cRedstone Flux§r). This includes all smeltable items such as food, ores, etc.

Other than that, the Energized Smelter is one of §5Mekanism§r's machines that are capable of §eupgrading to it's factory variant§r. The factory variants offers §ebulk smelting which means you can smelt a lot of items in one go§r, this will be useful in the mid-game for mass processing.

To craft it, you will need four §6Redstone Dust§r, two §6Basic Control Circuit§rs, two §6Glass§r, and a §6Steel Casing§r.
